edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.cryptopp
Class CryptoPpHash

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.cryptopp.CryptoPpHash
All Implemented Interfaces:
CryptographicHash
Direct Known Subclasses:
CryptoPpSHA1, CryptoPpSHA224, CryptoPpSHA256, CryptoPpSHA384, CryptoPpSHA512
public abstract class CryptoPpHash
extends java.lang.Object
implements CryptographicHash

A general adapter class of hash for Crypto++.

This class implements all the functionality by passing requests to the adaptee c++ abstract class HashTransformation of crypto++ using the JNI dll. A concrete hash function such as SHA1 represented by the class CryptoPpSHA1 only passes the name of the hash in the constructor to this base class. Since the underlying library is written in a native language we use the JNI architecture.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)
